item.title: Zara 所有者 Inditex 公布的第一季度销售额低于预期
item.description: 本周三，Zara 所有者 Inditex 第一季度销售额未达预期，使人们更加怀疑这家快速时尚零售商在不确定的经济环境中保持强劲销售增长的能力。【原文：Zara owner Inditex missed expectations for its first-quarter sales on Wednesday, adding to doubts about the ability of the fast-fashion retailer to keep delivering strong sales growth in an uncertain economic environment.】

item.title: 任天堂 Switch 2 刷新纪录，成为公司销量最快的游戏机
item.description: 日本任天堂公司周三表示，Switch 2 上市后的前四天销量已超过 350 万台，成为该公司迄今为止销量最快的游戏设备。【原文：Japan's Nintendo said on Wednesday it had sold more than 3.5 million Switch 2 units in the first four days after its launch, making the console the company's fastest-selling gaming device to date.】

item.title: 早间竞标：所以，这可能是一个交易框架？
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 民意调查 绝大多数经济学家认为日本央行将推迟至明年第一季度加息
item.description: 在路透社的一项民意调查中，略占多数的经济学家预计，日本央行将在 2026 年初加息 25 个基点，由于美国关税政策的不确定性，日本央行今年将放弃再次加息。【原文：The Bank of Japan will forego another interest rate hike this year due to uncertainty over U.S. tariff policy, according to a slight majority of economists in a Reuters poll who expect the next 25-basis-point increase in early 2026.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，加密货币公司 Bullish 秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）支持的加密货币交易所 Bullish 最近几周向美国证券交易委员会秘密提交了 IPO 申请。【原文：Peter Thiel-backed crypto exchange Bullish has confidentially filed for an IPO with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission in recent weeks, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 关税提升了美国 5 月份的基本消费价格
item.description: 由于汽油价格相对便宜，5月份美国消费者物价可能温和上涨，但特朗普政府的进口关税可能开始渗透到其他商品，并可能提高潜在的通胀压力。【原文：U.S. consumer prices likely increased moderately in May amid relatively cheaper gasoline, but the Trump administration's import tariffs probably started filtering through to other goods and potentially raising underlying inflation pressures.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，美国将洛克希德公司 F-35 战斗机的采购申请削减了一半
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，五角大楼正在将其向国会提出的购买洛克希德-马丁公司的 F-35 喷气式战斗机的要求缩减一半。【原文：The Pentagon is scaling back in half its request to Congress for Lockheed Martin's F-35 jets, Bloomberg on News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德：解决贸易战可能需要各方让步
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）周三表示，胁迫性贸易政策无法解决金融失衡问题，经济相互损害的风险如此之大，各方都需要权衡政策调整，以化解紧张局势。【原文：Coercive trade policies fail to resolve financial imbalances and the risk of mutual economic damage is so great that all sides need to weigh policy adjustments to resolve tensions, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国、墨西哥、欧盟、日本和加拿大敦促特朗普不要征收新的飞机关税
item.description: 周二公布的文件显示，中国、墨西哥、欧盟、日本、加拿大以及全球许多航空公司和航空航天公司都敦促特朗普政府不要对进口商用飞机和零部件征收新的国家安全关税。【原文：China, Mexico, the European Union, Japan, Canada and many airlines and aerospace companies worldwide urged the Trump administration not to impose new national security tariffs on imported commercial planes and parts, according to documents released Tuesday.】

item.title: 高通公司在越南成立人工智能研发中心
item.description: 美国芯片制造商高通公司（Qualcomm QCOM.O）周二表示，该公司已在越南成立了一个人工智能研发中心。【原文：U.S. chipmaker Qualcomm QCOM.O has launched an artificial intelligence research and development centre in Vietnam, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 至少八家中国汽车制造商承诺在 60 天内向供应商付款
item.description: 自周三晚些时候以来，至少有八家中国汽车制造商，包括行业领军企业比亚迪、奇瑞（CHERY.UL）和吉利，发表声明称将在 60 天内向供应商付款。【原文：At least eight Chinese automakers, including industry leaders BYD , Chery (CHERY.UL) and Geely , have published statements since late Wednesday saying they would pay their suppliers within 60 days.】

item.title: 据 Information 报道，Salesforce 阻止人工智能竞争对手使用 Slack 数据
item.description: 据 Information 周二报道，Salesforce 旗下的 Slack 最近禁止其他软件公司搜索或存储 Slack 消息，即使客户允许他们这样做。【原文：Salesforce owned Slack recently blocked other software firms from searching or storing Slack messages even if their customers permit them to do so, the Information reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 市场评估中美贸易谈判结果，油价下跌
item.description: 周三早盘，油价下跌，因为市场正在评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普尚未审查的中美贸易谈判结果，中国石油需求疲软和欧佩克+增产对市场构成了压力。【原文：Oil prices fell in early trade on Wednesday as markets were assessing the outcome of U.S.-China trade talks, yet to be reviewed by President Donald Trump, with weak oil demand from China and OPEC+ production increases weighing on the market.】

item.title: 中美达成放宽出口限制框架协议后美元持稳
item.description: 美元兑主要货币汇率周三持稳，此前美国和中国就贸易协议框架达成一致，投资者希望该协议有可能为解决世界两大经济体之间的破坏性贸易战铺平道路。【原文：The dollar was steady against its major peers on Wednesday, after U.S. and China agreed on a framework for a trade agreement that investors hoped could potentially pave the way to resolving a damaging trade war between the world's two largest economies.】

item.title: 股市对中美贸易框架作出克制反应
item.description: 周三，股市和美元对中美贸易谈判取得进展的最新迹象表示了谨慎的欢迎，同时也在等待更多有关决定内容的细节，以及决定是否会长期坚持下去。【原文：Share markets and the dollar on Wednesday offered a guarded welcome to the latest signs of progress in U.S.-China trade talks, while awaiting more detail of what was decided and whether it would stick for long.】

item.title: 特斯拉首席执行官马斯克表示，特斯拉的公共机器人出租车暂定于 6 月 22 日开始运营
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周二在 X 网站上发表文章称，特斯拉初步计划于 6 月 22 日开始向公众提供自动驾驶机器人出租车的乘坐服务。【原文：Tesla tentatively plans to begin offering rides on its self-driving robotaxis to the public on June 22, CEO Elon Musk said on Tuesday in a post on X.】

item.title: 美国上诉法院裁定，特朗普关税在上诉期间可继续生效
item.description: 周二，联邦上诉法院允许唐纳德-特朗普总统最大规模的关税继续生效，同时对下级法院以特朗普越权征收关税为由阻止这些关税的裁决进行复审。【原文：A federal appeals court allowed President Donald Trump's most sweeping tariffs to remain in effect on Tuesday while it reviews a lower court decision blocking them on grounds that Trump had exceeded his authority by imposing them.】

item.title: VIEW 分析师对中美贸易协定的反应
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示，与中国在伦敦达成的贸易框架和实施计划应能解决稀土和磁铁的限制问题。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said that a trade framework and implementation plan agreed with China in London should result in restrictions on rare earths and magnets being resolved.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称美中贸易框架应解决稀土问题
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周三表示，与中国在伦敦达成的贸易框架和实施计划应能解决稀土和磁性材料的限制问题。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Wednesday that a trade framework and implementation plan agreed with China in London should result in restrictions on rare earths and magents being resolved.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳航将关闭廉价航空公司捷星亚洲（Jetstar Asia
item.description: 澳大利亚国旗航空公司澳航（Qantas）周三表示，将关闭该集团设在新加坡的低成本航空公司捷星亚洲（Jetstar Asia）。【原文：Australian flag carrier Qantas said on Wednesday it will close Jetstar Asia, the group's Singapore-based low-cost unit.】

item.title: 墨西哥放宽对巴西鸡肉的贸易禁令
item.description: 巴西农业部周二表示，墨西哥放宽了对巴西鸡肉运输的禁令，现在只限制来自巴西南里奥格兰德州的产品，而不是之前的全国禁令。【原文：Mexico eased a ban on chicken shipments from Brazil, setting the restriction now only to products coming from the Brazilian state of Rio Grande do Sul, instead of a previous countrywide ban, Brazil's Agriculture Ministry said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 太空与国防技术公司 Voyager 在美国首次公开募股中募集到 3.828 亿美元资金
item.description: 在全球急剧增加军费开支的背景下，航天与国防技术公司 Voyager Technologies 周二表示，该公司在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 3.828 亿美元。【原文：Voyager Technologies raised $382.8 million in its U.S. initial public offering, the space and defense tech company said on Tuesday, amid a global rush to amp up military spending.】

item.title: 通用汽车在美国投资 3 家工厂生产天然气和电动汽车
item.description: 通用汽车公司周二表示，计划在美国的三个工厂投资约 40 亿美元。【原文：General Motors on Tuesday said it is planning to invest about $4 billion at three U.S. facilities.】

item.title: 星巴克加速向北美所有门店推广新的人员配置模式
item.description: 星巴克首席执行官布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）周二告诉路透社记者，他将加快推出咖啡连锁店的新员工和服务模式，目标是在夏季结束前实现北美全部 18,000 家门店的目标，而不是最初计划的到年底仅实现美国三分之一门店的目标。【原文：Starbucks CEO Brian Niccol told Reuters on Tuesday that he would accelerate the rollout of the coffeehouse chain's new staffing and service model, aiming for all 18,000 North American stores by summer's end, rather than the initial plan for just a third of U.S. stores by year-end.】

item.title: 法国 Mistral 公司推出欧洲首个人工智能推理模型
item.description: 本周二，Mistral 公司推出了欧洲首个人工智能推理模型，该模型利用逻辑思维做出反应，它试图在人工智能发展的最前沿与美国和中国的竞争对手并驾齐驱。【原文：Mistral on Tuesday launched Europe's first AI reasoning model, which uses logical thinking to create a response, as it tries to keep pace with American and Chinese rivals at the forefront of AI development.】

item.title: 交易日 浮力战胜不确定性
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 美国公司推出 ETF 基金，利用特朗普放松管制的推动力
item.description: 由三家投资管理公司组成的合伙企业周二表示，将联手推出交易所交易基金，投资于他们预计将从放松管制和自由资本市场中受益的公司。【原文：A group of three investment management firms teamed up to launch an exchange-traded fund that will invest in companies they expect to benefit from deregulation and free capital markets, the partners in the venture said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，JERA 接近签署从英联邦购买 1 MTPA 液化天然气的协议
item.description: 两位消息人士告诉路透社，美国液化天然气开发商 Commonwealth LNG 即将与日本最大的发电商 JERA 签订协议，从其位于路易斯安那州的拟议出口设施中每年供应 100 万吨液化天然气。【原文：U.S. liquefied natural gas developer Commonwealth LNG is close to signing a deal with Japan's biggest power generator, JERA, to supply it with 1 million metric tons per annum (mtpa) of LNG from its proposed export facility in Louisiana, two sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：美国和墨西哥接近达成削减钢铁关税的协议
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周二援引知情人士的话报道称，美国和墨西哥即将达成一项协议，取消美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对一定数量以下的墨西哥进口钢铁征收的 50%关税。【原文：The United States and Mexico are close to a deal that would get rid of 50% tariffs that U.S. President Donald Trump has imposed on Mexican steel imports up to a certain volume, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道：巴西商人塔努雷在与诺沃诺公司策划竞购布拉什肯公司后向银行求助
item.description: 巴西商人纳尔逊-塔努雷（Nelson Tanure）告诉路透社，他已开始与银行谈判，这将是他竞购石化公司 Braskem 的关键，他的目标是在今年达成交易，让石油巨头巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）在运营中发挥更大作用。【原文：Brazilian businessman Nelson Tanure has begun talks with the banks that will be key to his bid for petrochemical firm Braskem , he told Reuters, as he aims to clinch a deal this year and give oil giant Petrobras a larger role in operations.】
